Package org.ingatan.component.librarymanager

Subcomponents of the library manager, as well as the LibraryManagerWindow itself.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractQuestionContainer This abstract class provides the container for question components.
AnswerFieldPalette The answer field palette provides an interface for selecting/inserting answer field components into the answer text of questions.
EditAnswerFieldsDialog This class allows the user to add and remove answer fields, as well as set the default values for answer fields.
ExportDialog This dialog allows the user to select multiple libraries from any group, and export them to a specified location on the hard disk.
FlexiQuestionContainer This question container type is used for freeform questions.
FlexiQuestionContainer.TextFocusListener Static text focus listener allows for the rich text toolbar to follow which RichTextArea has focus.
GroupEditorDialog Allows the user to edit, delete or create groups, and change which libraries exist in which groups.
LibraryBrowser Used in the library manager, this component encapsulates the loaded group and library files, as well as providing an interface by which the user may navigate through groups and select libraries.

The component also provides incorporates buttons for editing the group, adding a new library, deleting a library, editing a library and importing/exporting a group/library.
LibraryEditorDialog Provides a dialog allowing the user to edit the name of the library, the description of the library, and to clear the 'correctness' values for all questions that it contains.
LibraryManagerWindow The library manager is Ingatan's content creation centre.
LibraryStatisticsPane  
MultipleLibrarySelector Component made up of a library browser and a selection list.
QuestionList The question list is a JScrollPane based container which holds all of the QuestionContainers for questions that exist in a library.
QuestionListToolbar Toolbar for the QuestionList component.
QuestionStatisticsBar A thin statistics bar that provides an overview of the currently focussed question.
SelectorTab This is the selection tab for question containers.
TableQuestionContainer This question container type is used for more flashcard style questions.
TableQuestionOptionPane Option pane that appears below the table in the TableQuestionContainer.
 

Package org.ingatan.component.librarymanager Description

Subcomponents of the library manager, as well as the LibraryManagerWindow itself.
